aservio.presentation.management.controllers.overview

Class OverviewManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • aservio.presentation.management.controllers.overview.OverviewManager

  • public class OverviewManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the different sets of Overview's relevant for the Management view. Also manages relevant activities based on selected users.
    See Also:
    OverviewMonth, OverviewWeek, OverviewDay

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OverviewManager() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Overview getCurrentOverview()
      Retrieve the current Overview currentOverview.
      void setShowOwnActivites(boolean showOwnActivites)
      Set showOwnActivites.
      void showDay()
      Set the currentOverview to the Day FXML using OverviewType.DAY.
      void showMonth()
      Set the currentOverview to the Month FXML using OverviewType.MONTH.
      void showNext()
      Upon clicking the Next button in the right corner, call the currentOverview's Pageable.next() method.
      void showPrevious()
      Upon clicking the Previous button in the right corner, call the currentOverview's Pageable.previous() method.
      void showWeek()
      Set the currentOverview to the Week FXML using OverviewType.WEEK.
      void updateCurrentView()
      Update the view currently selected.

      • setShowOwnActivites

        public void setShowOwnActivites(boolean showOwnActivites)
        Set showOwnActivites. Will mostly be used by Management.
        Parameters:
        showOwnActivites - Whether or not to show activities related to the currently logged in user.

      • getCurrentOverview

        Retrieve the current Overview currentOverview.
